strapiPost.title: Popable And Walmart Team Up To Empower Small Businesses
strapiPost.content:
This week Popable and Walmart announced a partnership that will give small businesses the opportunity to rent retail space in Walmart stores across the country. 

  • It’s poppin’: Popable is a pop-up shop marketplace platform that connects brands and spaces for short-term retail leasing opportunities.
  • Symbiotic: The partnership will bring new brands and goods to local communities while benefiting small businesses with the growth potential of increased exposure. 

Read more about this strategic partnership HERE.
